subject: Football
lead_paragraph: MINNEAPOLIS, Dec. 2 (AP) — Wearing a brace on his right knee and playing for the first time in three weeks, Adrian Peterson was a bit hesitant on the first few plays of the game.
snippet: MINNEAPOLIS, Dec. 2 (AP) — Wearing a brace on his right knee and playing for the first time in three weeks, Adrian Peterson was a bit hesitant on the first few plays of the game.
